ExpressionItem.Name: Summe
ExpressionItem.Description: Berechnet die Summe &uuml eber eine Menge von Werten.

ExpressionItem.Name: Average
ExpressionItem.Description: Computes the average of sequence of number.

ExpressionItem.Name: Min
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the min value of sequence.

ExpressionItem.Name: Max
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the max value of sequence.

ExpressionItem.Name: Count
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the count of sequence.

ExpressionItem.Name: First
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the first value of sequence.

ExpressionItem.Name: Last
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the last value of sequence.

ExpressionItem.Name: Now
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the current system date and time.

ExpressionItem.Name: Today
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the current date. Regardless of the actual time, this function returns midnight of the current date.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddDays
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of days away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddHours
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of hours away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddMilliseconds
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of milliseconds away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddMinutes
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of minutes away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddMonths
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of months away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddSeconds
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of seconds away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddTicks
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of ticks away from the specified DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddTimeSpan
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is away from the specified DateTime for the given TimeSpan.

ExpressionItem.Name: AddYears
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a date-time value that is the specified number of years away from the specieid DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: DateDiffDay
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the number of day boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

ExpressionItem.Name: DateDiffHour
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the number of hour boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

ExpressionItem.Name: DateDiffMilliSecond
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the number of millisecond boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

ExpressionItem.Name: DateDiffMinute
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the number of minute boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

ExpressionItem.Name: DateDiffSecond
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the number of second boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

ExpressionItem.Name: DateDiffTick
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the number of tick boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetDate
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts a date from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetDay
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts a day from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetDayOfWeek
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts a day of the week from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetDayOfYear
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts a day of the year from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetHour
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts an hour from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetMilliSecond
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts milliseconds from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetMinute
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts minutes from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetMonth
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts a month from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetSecond
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts seconds from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetTimeOfDay
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts the time of the day from the defined DateTime, in ticks.

ExpressionItem.Name: GetYear
ExpressionItem.Description: Extracts a year from the defined DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: UtcNow
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the current system date and time, expressed as Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

ExpressionItem.Name: IIf
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns either TruePart or FalsePart, depending on the evaluation of the Boolean Expression.

ExpressionItem.Name: IsNull
ExpressionItem.Description: Replaces the NULL with the specified replacement value.

ExpressionItem.Name: Abs
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the absolute, positive value of the given numeric expression.

ExpressionItem.Name: Ceiling
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the ceiling value of a specified number.

ExpressionItem.Name: Floor
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the floor value of a specified number.

ExpressionItem.Name: Acos
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the arccosine of a number (the angle, in radians, whose cosine is the given float expression).

ExpressionItem.Name: Asin
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the arcsine of a number (the angle, in radians, whose sine is the given float expression).

ExpressionItem.Name: Atan
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the arctangent of a number (the angle, in radians, whose tangent is the given float expression).

ExpressionItem.Name: BigMul
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns an Int64 containing the full product of two specified 32-bit numbers.

ExpressionItem.Name: Cos
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the cosine of the angle defined in radians.

ExpressionItem.Name: Cosh
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of the angle defined in radians.

ExpressionItem.Name: Exp
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the exponential value of the given float expression.

ExpressionItem.Name: Log
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the natural logarithm of a specified number.

ExpressionItem.Name: Log10
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the base 10 logarithm of a specified number.

ExpressionItem.Name: Power
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a specified number raised to a specified power.

ExpressionItem.Name: Rnd
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a random number that is less than 1, but greater than or equal to zero.

ExpressionItem.Name: Round
ExpressionItem.Description: Rounds the given value to the nearest integer.

ExpressionItem.Name: Sign
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the positive (+1), zero (0), or negative (-1) sign of the given expression.

ExpressionItem.Name: Sin
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the sine of the angle, defined in radians.

ExpressionItem.Name: Sinh
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of the angle defined in radians.

ExpressionItem.Name: Sqrt
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the square root of a given number.

ExpressionItem.Name: Tan
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the tangent of the angle defined in radians.

ExpressionItem.Name: Tanh
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the angle defined in radians.

ExpressionItem.Name: ToStr
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a string representation of an object.

ExpressionItem.Name: Trim
ExpressionItem.Description: Removes all occurrences of white space characters from the beginning and end of this instance.

ExpressionItem.Name: Lenght
ExpressionItem.Description: Gets the number of characters in a string.

ExpressionItem.Name: Format
ExpressionItem.Description: Replaces the format item in a specified System.String with the text equivalent of the value of a specified System.Object instance.

ExpressionItem.Name: SubString
ExpressionItem.Description: Retrieves a substring from a string. The substring starts at a specified character position and has a specified length.

ExpressionItem.Name: Insert
ExpressionItem.Description: Inserts String2 into String1 at the position specified by StartPositon.

ExpressionItem.Name: Lower
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the String in lowercase.

ExpressionItem.Name: Upper
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns String in uppercase.

ExpressionItem.Name: PadLeft
ExpressionItem.Description: Left-aligns characters in the defined string, padding its left side with white space characters up to a specified total length.

ExpressionItem.Name: PadRight
ExpressionItem.Description: Right-aligns characters in the defined string, padding its right side with white space characters up to a specified total length.

ExpressionItem.Name: Remove
ExpressionItem.Description: Deletes a specified number of characters from this instance, beginning at a specified position.

ExpressionItem.Name: Replace
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns a copy of String1, in which SubString2 has been replaced with String3.

ExpressionItem.Name: ConvertToInt
ExpressionItem.Description: Converts particular expression to System.Int32.

ExpressionItem.Name: ConvertToDouble
ExpressionItem.Description: Converts particular expression to System.Double.

ExpressionItem.Name: ConvertToBool
ExpressionItem.Description: Converts particular expression to System.Boolean.

ExpressionItem.Name: ConvertToDate
ExpressionItem.Description: Converts particular expression to System.DateTime.

ExpressionItem.Name: ConvertToStr
ExpressionItem.Description: Converts particular expression to System.String.

ExpressionItem.Name: Plus
ExpressionItem.Description: Adds the value of one numeric expression to another, or concatenates two strings.

ExpressionItem.Name: Minus
ExpressionItem.Description: Finds the difference between two numbers.

ExpressionItem.Name: Multiply
ExpressionItem.Description: Multiplies the value of two expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: Divide
ExpressionItem.Description: Divides the first operand by the second.

ExpressionItem.Name: Modulus
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns the remainder (modulus) obtained by dividing one numeric expression into another.

ExpressionItem.Name: Equal
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns true if both operands have the same value; otherwise, it returns false.

ExpressionItem.Name: GreaterThan
ExpressionItem.Description: Greater than operator. Used to compare expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: LessThan
ExpressionItem.Description: Less than operator. Used to compare expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: GreaterOrEqual
ExpressionItem.Description: Greater than or equal to operator. Used to compare expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: LessOrEqual
ExpressionItem.Description: Less than or equal to operator. Used to compare expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: NotEqual
ExpressionItem.Description: Returns true if the operands do not have the same value; otherwise, it returns false.

ExpressionItem.Name: And
ExpressionItem.Description: Performs a logical conjunction on two expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: Or
ExpressionItem.Description: Performs a logical disjunction on two Boolean expressions.

ExpressionItem.Name: Not
ExpressionItem.Description: Performs logical negation on an expression.

ExpressionItem.Name: In
ExpressionItem.Description: Tests for the existence.

ExpressionItem.Name: Between
ExpressionItem.Description: Specifies a range to test. Returns true if a value is greater than or equal to the first operand and less than or equal to the second operand.

ExpressionItem.Name: True
ExpressionItem.Description: Represents the Boolean value TRUE

ExpressionItem.Name: False
ExpressionItem.Description: Represents the Boolean value FALSE

ExpressionItem.Name: Null
ExpressionItem.Description: Represents NULL.
